message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $950000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $850000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $850000 is a significant amount, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're still not satisfied with the price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $925000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I'm not willing to go back to the previous price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my original price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $920000. This is the final offer I'm willing to make.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your original price, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $915000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I'm not willing to go down to $915000, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my original price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $918000. This is the final offer I'm willing to make.

I'm sorry, Alice, but I'm not willing to go up to $918000. I think I've made a fair offer at $915000. I'm willing to walk away from the deal if we can't agree on a price. I'm going to have to consider buying the product from John for $1000000.
